name: understanding-typescript
description: - Use TypeScript and its Features like Types, ES6 Support, Classes, Modules, Interfaces and much more in any of their Projects. - Why TypeScript offers a real advantage over vanilla JavaScript. - Learn how to combine TypeScript with ReactJS or NodeJS / Express. - Understand what TypeScript really is about and how it works. - Learn TypeScript both in theory as well as applied to real use-cases and projects. - This course is created By (**`Maximilian Schwarzm√ºller`**).
